Summary: There is no logo on the welcome page if the user is an administrator

Description.Detailed_info_on_the_defect: There is no logo on the welcome page if the user is an administrator
Description.Actual_result: The logo is missing from the top left-hand corner of the page
Description.Expected_result: The logo is displayed in the top left-hand corner of the page

Steps_to_reproduce.Defect: There is no logo in the top left-hand corner of the page (an empty space with the word 'logo' in its place)
